sentences.en: As the army retreated , it laid waste to thousands of acres of farmland.
sentences.cn: 军队后撤时毀坏了几千英亩农田.

sentences.en: If the tiller is industrious, the farmland is productive.
If this wet land was drained, it would be good farmland.
sentences.cn: 如果把这块湿地的水排干, 这块地就会成为良田.

sentences.en: It is forbidden to occupy basic farmland to develop horticulture or dig ponds to breed fish.
sentences.cn: 禁止占用基本农田发展林果业和挖塘养鱼.

sentences.en: It is surrounded by 62 acres of farmland.
sentences.cn: 它被62英亩的农田环绕着。

sentences.en: Only 5.9 per cent of the area is now covered in trees. Most of the remainder is farmland.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的树木覆盖率只有5.9%。其他多数地方都是农田。

sentences.en: The Netherlands has been reclaiming farmland from water.
sentences.cn: 荷兰人一直在围海造地。

sentences.en: The problems concerning mountains , rivers, farmland, forests and roads should be tackled in a comprehensive way.
sentences.cn: 实行山、水 、 田 、 林、路综合治理.

sentences.en: The river overflowed and submerged the farmland.
These tree belts effectively protect the farmland against shifting sand.
sentences.cn: 这些防护林带有效地保护了农田,使之免受流沙侵袭.

sentences.en: They had to sell off 10 percent of all underutilized farmland.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不将10%未被充分利用的农田廉价卖掉。

sentences.en: They opened up large areas of wasteland and turned them into farmland.
sentences.cn: 他们在荒原上拓出大片农田.

sentences.en: This area of former farmland was worked as a gravel pit until 1964.
sentences.cn: 这块过去曾是农田的地1964年前一直被用作沙砾坑。

sentences.en: To the south the hills dropped away to farmland.
sentences.cn: 山势在南边一路下倾延伸至农田。
